trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Port St. Lucie
There were 2 other sightings in Port St. Lucie on or around August 29th 2013
divs: sighting detailsat 9:15 pm, we came on to our back patio which faces west. we saw what looked like a planet or a star at tree line level. very bright. golden orange in color. we found this strange as we are not used to seeing anything like that so low in the sky. we sat and looked at it for about 5 minutes. as it was so still, my husband took out his iphone planet\star finder and nothing was indicated in that area. at this time the object began to move slightly up, down, left and right in the same area. it was silent. glowing brightly, but not casting light beyond itself. no blinking or pulsing lights. it did this for about 5 minutes before heading below the tree line briefly and then up and out to the n-nw at a rapid speed. as it was traveling, it kept it's sawtooth like pattern. we watched it until it was out of our sight. we have never seen anything like it. about a half hour later, there were multiple aircraft in the vicinity.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
